issue.title: [C++][CI] Add .ccache to the docker-compose volume mounts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7120](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7120). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should speed up the compilation steps. Although I'm not sure whether we should define it as a "docker named volume" or a standard volume mounted from the host. The former one provides better isolation whereas the latter one makes the integration with GitHub actions and it's cache plugin easier.
